entity: description: name of the entity, type: str
description: description: description of the entity, type: str

attribute.name: description: name of the attribute, type: str
attribute.description: description: description of the attribute, type: str
attribute.pk: description: the attribute is the entity's primary key (0 or 1 or null), type: int
attribute.datatype: description: datatype of the attribute, type: str
attribute.length: description: length of the attribute (number or null), type: int
attribute.scale: description: scale of the attribute (number or null), type: int
attribute.link_entity: description: id of the linked entity, type: str

source.source: description: id of the source, type: str
source.schema: description: the source schema, type: str
source.table: description: the source table, type: str
